title: Video of Mob Thrashing Man in Meerut Shared as Delhi Incident
subtitle: Mob Thrashing Man in Delhi Viral Video Fact Check: A day after a man was brutally beaten to death at Old Delhi Railway Station, official account of Delhi Youth Congress and Journalist Samir Abbas on 28 Aug, tweeted an alleged video of the incident
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The Old Delhi incident took place on the night of 26 August and the video in question was taken during the day.

Few users in the comment section on the video suggested that the incident is from Meerut and not Delhi.

On further conducting a Google reverse image search with keywords “man” “thrashed” and “Meerut”, we found that the video was actually from Meerut and the incident happened in August.

The Times of India carried an ANI report along with visuals confirming the same. According to the report, a man was brutally thrashed after he allegedly molested a girl in a moving bus.
